Heading: Audio
Note: Audio recording – detail unspecified

Heading: Audio cassette
Note: Audio cassette (analogue)

Heading: CD-Audio
Note: Audio compact disc: use for ‘Red book’ discs (conventional audio CD) and SACD, and use coding in <ProductFormDetail> to specify the format, if required

Heading: DAT
Note: Digital audio tape cassette

Heading: Audio disc
Note: Audio disc (excluding CD-Audio): use for ‘Yellow book’ (CD-Rom-style) discs, including for example mp3 CDs, and use coding in <ProductFormDetail> to specify the format of the data on the disc

Heading: Audio tape
Note: Audio tape (analogue open reel tape)

Heading: MiniDisc
Note: Sony MiniDisc format

Heading: CD-Extra
Note: Audio compact disc with part CD-ROM content, also termed CD-Plus or Enhanced-CD: use for ‘Blue book’ and ‘Yellow/Red book’ two-session discs

Heading: Downloadable audio file
Note: Digital audio recording downloadable to the purchaser’s own device(s)

Heading: Pre-recorded digital audio player
Note: For example, Playaway audiobook and player: use coding in <ProductFormDetail> to specify the recording format, if required

Heading: Pre-recorded SD card
Note: For example, Audiofy audiobook chip

Heading: LP
Note: Vinyl disc (analogue).

Heading: Downloadable and online audio file
Note: Digital audio recording available both by download to the purchaser’s own device(s) and by online (eg streamed) access

Heading: Online audio file
Note: Digital audio recording available online (eg streamed), not downloadable to the purchaser’s own device(s)

Heading: Other audio format
Note: Other audio format not specified by AB to AM

Heading: Book
Note: Book – detail unspecified

Heading: Hardback
Note: Hardback or cased book

Heading: Paperback / softback
Note: Paperback or other softback book

Heading: Loose-leaf
Note: Loose-leaf book

Heading: Spiral bound
Note: Spiral, comb or coil bound book

Heading: Pamphlet
Note: Pamphlet, stapled; use for German ‘geheftet’. Includes low-extent wire-stitched books bound without a distinct spine (eg many comic books)

Heading: Leather / fine binding
Note: Use <ProductFormDetail> to provide additional description

Heading: Board book
Note: Child’s book with all pages printed on board

Heading: Rag book
Note: Child’s book with all pages printed on textile

Heading: Bath book
Note: Child’s book printed on waterproof material

Heading: Novelty book
Note: A book whose novelty consists wholly or partly in a format which cannot be described by any other available code – a ‘conventional’ format code is always to be preferred; one or more Product Form Detail codes, eg from the B2nn group, should be used whenever possible to provide additional description

Heading: Slide bound
Note: Slide bound book

Heading: Big book
Note: Extra-large format for teaching etc; this format and terminology may be specifically UK; required as a top-level differentiator

Heading: Part-work (fascículo)
Note: A part-work issued with its own ISBN and intended to be collected and bound into a complete book

Heading: Fold-out book or chart
Note: Concertina-folded booklet or chart, designed to fold to pocket or regular page size, and usually bound within distinct board or card covers: use for German ‘Leporello’

Heading: Foam book
Note: A children’s book whose cover and pages are made of foam

Heading: Other book format
Note: Other book format or binding not specified by BB to BP

Heading: Sheet map
Note: Sheet map – detail unspecified

Heading: Sheet map, rolled
Note: See <ProductPackaging> and Codelist 80 for ‘rolled in tube’

Heading: Globe
Note: Globe or planisphere

Heading: Other cartographic
Note: Other cartographic format not specified by CB to CE

Heading: Digital (on physical carrier)
Note: Digital content delivered on a physical carrier (detail unspecified)

Heading: CD-I
Note: CD interactive: use for ‘Green book’ discs

Heading: Diskette
Note: AKA ‘floppy disc’

Heading: Double-sided CD/DVD
Note: Double-sided disc, one side Audio CD/CD-ROM, other side DVD

Heading: Other digital carrier
Note: Other carrier of digital content not specified by DB to DN

Heading: Digital (delivered electronically)
Note: Digital content delivered electronically (delivery method unspecified)

Heading: Digital download and online
Note: Digital content available both by download and by online access

Heading: Digital online
Note: Digital content accessed online only

Heading: Digital download
Note: Digital content delivered by download only

Heading: Film or transparency
Note: Film or transparency – detail unspecified

Heading: Slides
Note: Photographic transparencies mounted for projection

Heading: OHP transparencies
Note: Transparencies for overhead projector

Heading: Filmstrip
Note: Photographic transparencies, unmounted but cut into short multi-frame strips

Heading: Film
Note: Continuous movie film as opposed to filmstrip

Heading: Other film or transparency format
Note: Other film or transparency format not specified by FB to FF

Heading: Digital product license
Note: Digital product license (delivery method not encoded)

Heading: Digital product license key
Note: Digital product license delivered through the retail supply chain as a physical ‘key’, typically a card or booklet containing a code enabling the purchaser to download the associated product

Heading: Digital product license code
Note: Digital product license delivered by email or other electronic distribution, typically providing a code enabling the purchaser to activate, upgrade or extend the license supplied with the associated product

Heading: Microform
Note: Microform – detail unspecified

Heading: Microfilm
Note: Roll microfilm

Heading: Other microform
Note: Other microform not specified by MB or MC

Heading: Miscellaneous print
Note: Miscellaneous printed material – detail unspecified

Heading: Address book
Note: May use <ProductFormDetail> codes P201 to P204 to specify binding

Heading: Cards
Note: Cards, flash cards (eg for teaching reading)

Heading: Copymasters
Note: Copymasters, photocopiable sheets

Heading: Diary
Note: May use <ProductFormDetail> codes P201 to P204 to specify binding

Heading: Frieze
Note: Narrow strip-shaped printed sheet used mostly for education or children’s products (eg depicting alphabet, number line, procession of illustrated characters etc). Usually intended for horizontal display

Heading: Kit
Note: Parts for post-purchase assembly

Heading: Poster
Note: Poster for retail sale – see also XF

Heading: Record book
Note: Record book (eg ‘birthday book’, ‘baby book’): binding unspecified; may use <ProductFormDetail> codes P201 to P204 to specify binding

Heading: Wallet or folder
Note: Wallet or folder (containing loose sheets etc): it is preferable to code the contents and treat ‘wallet’ as packaging in <ProductPackaging> with Codelist 80, but if this is not possible the product as a whole may be coded as a ‘wallet’

Heading: Plate (lámina)
Note: A book-sized (as opposed to poster-sized) sheet, usually in color or high quality print

Heading: Notebook / blank book
Note: A book with all pages blank for the buyer’s own use; may use <ProductFormDetail> codes P201 to P204 to specify binding

Heading: Organizer
Note: May use <ProductFormDetail> codes P201 to P204 to specify binding

Heading: Leaflet
Note: Folded but unbound

Heading: Other printed item
Note: Other printed item not specified by PB to PQ

Heading: Multiple-component retail product
Note: Presentation unspecified: format of product components must be given in <ProductPart>

Heading: Multiple-component retail product, boxed
Note: Format of product components must be given in <ProductPart>

Heading: Multiple-component retail product, slip-cased
Note: Format of product components must be given in <ProductPart>

Heading: Multiple-component retail product, shrink-wrapped
Note: Format of product components must be given in <ProductPart>. Use code XL for a shrink-wrapped pack for trade supply, where the retail items it contains are intended for sale individually

Heading: Multiple-component retail product, loose
Note: Format of product components must be given in <ProductPart>

Heading: Multiple-component retail product, part(s) enclosed
Note: Multiple component product where subsidiary product part(s) is/are supplied as enclosures to the primary part, eg a book with a CD packaged in a sleeve glued within the back cover. Format of product components must be given in <ProductPart>

Heading: Video
Note: Video – detail unspecified

Heading: Videodisc
Note: eg Laserdisc

Heading: DVD video
Note: DVD video: specify TV standard in <ProductFormDetail>

Heading: VHS video
Note: VHS videotape: specify TV standard in <ProductFormDetail>

Heading: Betamax video
Note: Betamax videotape: specify TV standard in <ProductFormDetail>

Heading: VCD
Note: VideoCD

Heading: SVCD
Note: Super VideoCD

Heading: HD DVD
Note: High definition DVD disc, Toshiba HD DVD format

Heading: Blu-ray
Note: High definition DVD disc, Sony Blu-ray format

Heading: UMD Video
Note: Sony Universal Media disc

Heading: CBHD
Note: China Blue High-Definition, derivative of HD-DVD

Heading: Other video format
Note: Other video format not specified by VB to VQ

Heading: Trade-only material
Note: Trade-only material (unspecified)

Heading: Dumpbin – filled
Note: Dumpbin with contents. ISBN (where applicable) and format of contained items must be given in <ProductPart>

Heading: Counterpack – filled
Note: Counterpack with contents. ISBN (where applicable) and format of contained items must be given in <ProductPart>

Heading: Poster, promotional
Note: Promotional poster for display, not for sale – see also PK

Heading: Window piece
Note: Promotional piece for shop window display

Heading: Large book display
Note: Large scale facsimile of book for promotional display

Heading: Shrink-wrapped pack
Note: A quantity pack with its own product code, usually for trade supply only: the retail items it contains are intended for sale individually. ISBN (where applicable) and format of contained items must be given in <ProductPart>. For products or product bundles supplied individually shrink-wrapped for retail sale, use code SD

Heading: Boxed pack
Note: A quantity pack with its own product code, usually for trade supply only: the retail items it contains are intended for sale individually. ISBN (where applicable) and format of contained items must be given in <ProductPart>. For products or product bundles boxed individually for retail sale, use code SB

Heading: Other point of sale
Note: Other point of sale material not specified by XB to XL

Heading: General merchandise
Note: General merchandise – unspecified

Heading: Soft toy
Note: Soft or plush toy

Heading: Game
Note: Board game, or other game (except computer game: see DE and other D* codes)

Heading: E-book reader
Note: Dedicated e-book reading device, typically with mono screen

Heading: Tablet computer
Note: General purpose tablet computer, typically with color screen

Heading: Audiobook player
Note: Dedicated audiobook player device, typically including book-related features like bookmarking

Heading: Mug
Note: For example, branded, promotional or tie-in drinking mug, cup etc

Heading: Tote bag
Note: For example, branded, promotional or tie-in bag

Heading: Tableware
Note: For example, branded, promotional or tie-in plates, bowls etc (note for mugs and cups, use code ZK)

Heading: Umbrella
Note: For example, branded, promotional or tie-in umbrella

Heading: Other apparel
Note: Other apparel items not specified by ZB to ZJ, including branded, promotional or tie-in scarves, caps, aprons etc

Heading: Other merchandise
Note: Other merchandise not specified by ZB to ZY
